document_data.mainbody:
evan Cymrych was High King of the Moonshae Isles in the early-to-mid 9 century DR.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the first son of his predecessor, High King Byron I. His successor was his second son, Dolan Cymrych.
In the , High King Byron I fell into a magic slumber, and Kevan stepped in to rule while his father was incapacitated. This short regency lasted until the following year.
Kevan became the true High King in the , after the death of his father. He ruled for twenty-four years before he died of natural causes in the .
